These three links have been selected based on their relevance (30% weight) to the user's information needs, credibility (15% weight), information depth (30% weight), and accessibility (20% weight). Link 2 offers a service for reporting missed bin collections online, which caters to users' immediate concerns, while links 6 and 3 offer comprehensive databases of information related to recycling and waste management services, providing long-term solutions.
